longBusinessSummary: RTL Group S.A., an entertainment company, operates television (TV) channels and radio stations, and provides streaming services in Germany, France, the Netherlands, Belgium, the United Kingdom, the United States, and internationally. The company's RTL Deutschland segment offers TV, streaming, radio, digital, and publishing services; owns TV channels, magazines, podcasts, and various digital offerings; and operates radio groups, including Antenne Bayern and Radio Hamburg. Its Groupe M6 segment operates television channels and radio stations, as well as offers digital services. The company's Fremantle segment is involved in the content production, such as distribution and licensing. Its Other segment includes RTL Hungary; RTL Luxembourg; We are Era; Atresmedia; and Broadcasting Center Europe, a technical services provider that offers media-as-a-service solutions for customers to build a customized set of media solutions, products, and services. The company was founded in 1924 and is based in Luxembourg, Luxembourg. RTL Group S.A. is a subsidiary of Bertelsmann Capital Holding GmbH.
